ThingDef.label: Demigryph Tropic fur
ThingDef.description: A soft furry pelt harvested from a Demigryph. It is difficult to pierce and insulates well against heat.

ThingDef.label: Demigryph Artic fur
ThingDef.description: A soft furry pelt harvested from a Demigryph. It is difficult to pierce and insulates well against cold.

ThingDef.label: Demigryph fur
ThingDef.description: A soft furry pelt harvested from a Demigryph. It is difficult to pierce.

ThingDef.label: Demigryph Feather
ThingDef.description: Demigryph Feathers taken as trophies from slain demigrphs.

ThingDef.label: Demigryph Claw
ThingDef.description: Demigryph Claws taken as trophies from slain demigrphs.

ThingDef.label: Demigryph
ThingDef.description: A powerful and noble creature the Demigryph was rumored to be made by empire nobles with too much money and time on their hands. Eagle and Lion mixed into a rimworlds deadliest predator, Empire and medieval noble seek them as mounts or trophies while the tribals worship or live in fear of them. This breed of Demigryph lives in prides, hunting as a pack and are the most numerous of the demi breeds.

ThingDef.label: CrimsonDemigryph
ThingDef.description: A powerful and noble creature the Demigryph was rumored to be made by empire nobles with too much money and time on their hands. Eagle and Lion mixed into a rimworlds deadliest predator, Empire and medieval noble seek them as mounts or trophies while the tribals worship or live in fear of them. This breed of Demigryph lives in prides, hunting as a pack and are the most numerous of the demi breeds. CrimsonDemigryph are the most territorial and blood thirsty of the demi breeds, hitting harder and requiring more food.

ThingDef.label: CheetahDemigryph
ThingDef.description: A powerful and noble creature the Demigryph was rumored to be made by empire nobles with too much money and time on their hands. Eagle and Cheetah mixed into a rimworlds deadliest predator, Empire and medieval noble seek them as mounts or trophies while the tribals worship or live in fear of them. This breed of Demigryph lives in solitude, hunting with speed and surprise to take down prey. Slightly smaller and weaker but no less dangerous then normal Demigryphs thanks to their greater speed.

ThingDef.label: VultureDemigryph
ThingDef.description: A powerful and noble creature the Demigryph was rumored to be made by empire nobles with too much money and time on their hands. Eagle and Cheetah mixed into a rimworlds deadliest predator, Empire and medieval noble seek them as mounts or trophies while the tribals worship or live in fear of them. This breed of Demigryph lives in solitude, relies mostly on scavenging in the harsh deserts it call home. Slightly smaller and weaker but no less dangerous then normal Demigryphs thanks to their greater speed.

ThingDef.label: LeopardDemigryph
ThingDef.description: A powerful and noble creature the Demigryph was rumored to be made by empire nobles with too much money and time on their hands. Eagle and Leopard mixed into a rimworlds deadliest predator, Empire and medieval noble seek them as mounts or trophies while the tribals worship or live in fear of them. This breed of Demigryph lives in solitude, thriving in cold enviroments.

ThingDef.label: PantherDemigryph
ThingDef.description: A powerful and noble creature the Demigryph was rumored to be made by empire nobles with too much money and time on their hands. Eagle and Panther mixed into a rimworlds deadliest predator, Empire and medieval noble seek them as mounts or trophies while the tribals worship or live in fear of them. This breed of Demigryph lives in solitude, thriving in Wet enviroments.

ThingDef.label: TigerDemigryph
ThingDef.description: A powerful and noble creature the Demigryph was rumored to be made by empire nobles with too much money and time on their hands. Eagle and Tiger mixed into a rimworlds deadliest predator, Empire and medieval noble seek them as mounts or trophies while the tribals worship or live in fear of them. This breed of Demigryph lives in solitude, thriving in Warm enviroments. Larger then the other Demigryphs with a a greater claw length, it often only needs to use its size to hold down most prey before devouring them

ThingDef.label: Daermigryph
ThingDef.description: A powerful and noble creature the Demigryph was rumored to be made by empire nobles with too much money and time on their hands. Eagle and Tiger mixed into a rimworlds deadliest predator, Empire and medieval noble seek them as mounts or trophies while the tribals worship or live in fear of them. This breed of Demigryph lives in solitude, thriving in Warm enviroments. Larger then the other Demigryphs with a a greater claw length, it often only needs to use its size to hold down most prey before devouring them. Daermigryph have horns thanks to a mad man that put horns on every animal he could, tribals think it makes the animal sacred.

ThingDef.label: JadeDemigryph
ThingDef.description: A powerful and noble creature the Demigryph was rumored to be made by empire nobles with too much money and time on their hands. Eagle and Panther mixed into a rimworlds deadliest predator, Empire and medieval noble seek them as mounts or trophies while the tribals worship or live in fear of them. This breed of Demigryph lives in solitude, thriving in Wet enviroments.
